title: Cry Of The City [1948] Dir. Robert Siodmak, Starring Richard Conte, Shelley Winters, Victor Mature

sources.title: Cry Of The City
sources.description: You can find out more about this movie from Wikipedia and Film Nolr of the Week . Â  Cry of the City is a 1948 black-and-white Film Noir directed by Robert Siodmak, based on the novel by Henry Edward Helseth, The Chair for Martin Rome. The screenwriter Ben Hecht worked on the film's script, but is not credited. The film was partly shot on location in New York City and stars Richard Conte, Shelley Winters and Victor Mature
